import sys

a, b, c, d = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))

if a > b:
    a, b = b, a
if c > d:
    c, d = d, c

print(max(a * c, a * d, b * c, b * d))

import sys

a, b, c, d = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())

print(max(a*c, a*d, b*c, b*d))

a, b, c, d = map(int, input().split())

if a <= c:
    x = b
    y = d
else:
    x = a
    y = d

print(x * y)
